#summary &ocirc character entity
#labels about-html,from-w3c
#sidebar TOCCharacterEntitiesO

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesO O] > &ocirc

== Value ==

There are 4 variations of this entity:

  * `&Ocirc;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00d4/index.htm U+000D4].
  * `&Ocirc` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00d4/index.htm U+000D4].
  * `&ocirc;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00f4/index.htm U+000F4].
  * `&ocirc` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00f4/index.htm U+000F4].
